summary: Break represents a concept that encourages pausing and stepping back from work. It's associated with the idea of transforming work into an engaging adventure, as seen in the course "Play To Work". This approach involves creating a playful environment, experimenting fearlessly, and tracking progress like a game. Breaking and rebuilding ideas is part of the process, emphasizing the importance of taking breaks to foster creativity, learning, and growth. It's linked to concepts of fun, focus, and team development in the workplace.
excerpt: Play To Work transforms your job into an engaging adventure. Start by defining your purpose, then create a playful environment. Experiment fearlessly, breaking and rebuilding ideas. Track progress like a game, keeping score to boost motivation.
